venue.name: Intersection of Memorial Drive & JFK St

item.description:
hi everyone,

the forecast is for good weather next weekend, so let's take advantage of it and get together to skate on memorial drive on sunday.

i'll be at the corner of JFK Street and Memorial Drive at 12:45 pm. i'll wait until 1 pm and then we'll skate for 30 - 60 minutes or so.

please note that this skate is for all skill levels so come on out and roll around with us. as usual, if you're a more advanced skater, please feel free to take off ... but come on back to chat once in awhile.

when we're done skating, what better way to relax and continue to enjoy a beautiful day than to go inside and drink? after the skate, i'm going over to the Border Cafe in harvard square for a margarita and a bite to eat. please feel free to join me. (walking directions to border cafe from jfk & mem drive.)

hope to see you on sunday.
item.how_to_find_us: i'll email a cell # to everyone who RSVPs 'Yes' by 6 september, 10 am
item.name: Memorial Drive Skate and Margaritas
